title: HTML Basics: Structure and Semantics
description: Learn the structure of web pages and master semantic HTML.
summary: This foundational course covers all essential HTML5 tags, including forms, tables, and modern semantic elements like <header> and <footer>. You'll build the structural backbone of any modern website.

title: CSS Fundamentals: Styling and Layouts
description: Master styling and create beautiful layouts with CSS.
summary: Dive into CSS. Understand selectors, the box model, inheritance, and crucial layout methods like Flexbox.

title: JavaScript Essentials: Interactivity
description: Unlock interactivity with core JavaScript programming.
summary: Learn variables, arrays, loops, conditionals, functions, and DOM manipulation.

title: React Fundamentals: Component Architecture
summary: Understand Components, Props, State, and how to structure a modern SPA.

title: Advanced CSS Grid Layout
description: Create complex responsive layouts with CSS Grid.
summary: Master CSS Grid: grid-template-areas, implicit grids, and responsive design.

title: React Hooks Deep Dive
description: Master React Hooks for state and effects.
summary: Understand useState, useEffect, useContext, and custom hooks.

title: JavaScript Async Programming
description: Master asynchronous JavaScript with Promises and Async/Await.
summary: Learn how to handle non-blocking operations and fetch API data.

title: Responsive Web Design
description: Build mobile-first responsive websites with media queries.
summary: Learn media queries, fluid design, breakpoints, and responsive layouts.
